posts.title: Over The Door Hanging Shoe Rack
posts.content: Double your closet’s storage capacity without performing costly renovations by using this over the door hanging shoe rack. It’s designed for most standard size doors and can hold up to 36 pairs of shoes, freeing up floor space and eliminating clutter.

posts.title: Kindle Paperwhite Digital Book Reader
posts.content: Keep your entire literary collection in the palm of your hand by storing them on this digital book reader. It features a 300 ppi display for a clearer image and gives off absolutely no screen glare so you can read with less strain even while under the sun.

posts.title: BBQ Briefcase
posts.content: Instantly turn any location into the ideal BBQ spot by bringing along this BBQ briefcase. This compact grill opens out into a mini charcoal grill large enough to cook for up to two people and folds back up into a lightweight package that you can carry one-handed.

posts.title: Calorie Counting Wine Glass
posts.content: Take drinking responsibly to a whole new level with the calorie counting wine glass – with each pour you’ll be able to <del>guilt trip yourself</del> determine how many belly bloating calories you’ll be consuming so you can stay faithful to the diet you just started two days ago.

posts.title: Wine Bottle Combination Lock
posts.content: Ensure no one can get their grubby hands on your favorite bottle by using this wine bottle combination lock. The lock features a simple design that goes on in seconds and won’t unlock until the three digit combination is entered.

posts.title: You Killed Kenny USB Drive
posts.content: You bastard! Now you’ll have to kill Kenny every time you want to get your data. This custom built South Park USB drive was created by installing a flash drive into the head of the officially licensed mini Kenny toy. Also available is a less exciting version already built.

posts.title: Hands Free Electric Shoe Polisher
posts.content: Give your shoes the mirror-like shine a gentleman such as yourself deserves using the hands free electric shoe polisher. It automates every step of the shoe polishing process to deliver a professional buff and shine from the comfort of home.

posts.title: Party Light Ball
posts.content: Turn your next party into the most far-out celebration your town has ever seen using the party light ball. With the flick of a switch the room goes from lame to groovy as it is illuminated by a plethora of rotating multicolored lights. Groovy.

posts.title: Star Wars Paper Kirigami Book
posts.content: Elevate your paper folding skills to Yoda-like levels by sitting down with this Star Wars paper Kirigami book. Using nothing more than a ruler, a cutting mat, and a utility knife, you’ll be able to craft up to 15 different spaceships from the Star Wars universe.

posts.title: My Family Recipe Cookbook
posts.content: Archive generations worth of passed down recipes by writing them in this “My Family Recipe” cookbook. Apart from providing helpful cooking guides and tips, the notebook features template space for you to store over eighty of your own secret recipes.

posts.title: Ice Cream Parlor Mixing Set
posts.content: Turn your kitchen counter into a gourmet dessert station by whipping up tasty concoctions on the ice cream parlor mixing set. It includes all the tools you need to serve your favorite frozen treat just like the professionals – Coldstone just became obsolete.

posts.title: Floppy Disk Drink Coasters
posts.content: If you’re a big fan of re-purposed obsolete technology, you’ll love the floppy disk drink coasters. These floppies are made of silicone and look exactly like the standard 3.5″ floppy disks of yesteryear. It’s a fun and geeky way to unsightly water rings on the furniture.
